0730229a-b640-4361-9b4e-8d3ce175d882.name: Focus-Limited (@Any ordinary variety of matter or energy@)

ba8ebf8a-d5a4-4173-ab38-f205aa4a64ae.name: Focus-Limited (@Any ordinary variety of matter or energy@)

d4b3b13f-2437-4d3a-82e5-89d85a5c8e31.name: *Assistance with this Psionic Powers Library*
d4b3b13f-2437-4d3a-82e5-89d85a5c8e31.notes: Helpful comments can be found in the modifiers of this advantage.

8a48a276-1852-4023-8fbc-0f54d1864ae1.name: 0 point psionic abilities
8a48a276-1852-4023-8fbc-0f54d1864ae1.notes: Many psionic abilities in the GURPS Psionic Powers book do not have a fixed cost per level.  To deal with this, I used modifiers as a replacement for ability levels.  You only need 1 level active at a time (i.e. you do not need Interruption_2 and Interruption_1 active, only Interruption_2).

16bb6bb9-fdd1-4610-bf92-d96c82ba81bb.name: Skills requiring an _ (underscore) as a prereq.
16bb6bb9-fdd1-4610-bf92-d96c82ba81bb.notes: The underscore is related to the irregular points per level of some psionic abilities.  If a skill is red and says this is the problem, go to the related ability and activate a modifier to "level up" your ability.  All levels 1+ fulfil this requirement.

6ef40389-bba9-4ea6-af48-785843404ee4.name: Custom Psionic Powers
6ef40389-bba9-4ea6-af48-785843404ee4.notes: Limited versions of psionic powers at reduced cost.  These are not compatible with the delimited version the power (i.e. Take either Telekinesis talent or Psychokinesis Talent, but not both.)

3047edec-ca5b-454a-97f7-db4a388b99b8.name: Questions, Comments, Errors
3047edec-ca5b-454a-97f7-db4a388b99b8.notes: This is an early edition and is quite possibly riddled with errors.  I'd welcome any assistance; Send any comments to jdshue@mtu.edu

26af6987-6227-4c42-99c2-06f47dc34c8f.name: Cancellation
26af6987-6227-4c42-99c2-06f47dc34c8f.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Temporarily turn off all of target's psionic abilities.

c52182ca-e81a-48eb-b82d-477857db6d98.name: Cancellation_2
c52182ca-e81a-48eb-b82d-477857db6d98.notes: Skin-to-skin contact. Can immediately retry after a failure.

6a529530-ef87-4144-b613-95236a5992d6.name: Cancellation_4
6a529530-ef87-4144-b613-95236a5992d6.notes: Can cancel someone at a distance; apply range penalties on p. B550

c167770a-aba5-4765-8965-538a1ecf1227.name: Cancellation_5
c167770a-aba5-4765-8965-538a1ecf1227.notes: Can cancel someone at a distance; apply long-distance modifiers p. B241

df5279ba-de9e-47b5-afd0-1321e48b48d3.name: Interruption
df5279ba-de9e-47b5-afd0-1321e48b48d3.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Interrupt a connection between a psi and his target.

ad236f4b-cb27-4aae-9aa2-3f2c952bc2cf.name: Interruption_3
ad236f4b-cb27-4aae-9aa2-3f2c952bc2cf.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

cdc24d0a-03b4-4690-91ec-94716d249fa2.name: Interruption_4
cdc24d0a-03b4-4690-91ec-94716d249fa2.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

ec8b6744-d11c-4be5-9b17-0b447523f37b.name: Interruption (Have Cancellation)
ec8b6744-d11c-4be5-9b17-0b447523f37b.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Interrupt a connection between a psi and his target.

9285f781-d9c1-4d3b-86c1-242769642725.name: Interruption_3
9285f781-d9c1-4d3b-86c1-242769642725.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

d15ffebd-ef91-42d6-acc8-bdbf420fc46e.name: Interruption_4
d15ffebd-ef91-42d6-acc8-bdbf420fc46e.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

054eb23c-ee06-4611-8d95-8d496a626e3a.name: Para-Invisibility
054eb23c-ee06-4611-8d95-8d496a626e3a.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Invisible to psionic detection.

c7f9c4a5-c52f-492b-8df4-cf7375bdf12a.name: Psionic Overload
c7f9c4a5-c52f-492b-8df4-cf7375bdf12a.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Overload a psi's abilities, causing them to manifest uncontrollably.

433596da-7601-44de-91b8-553837feba4a.name: Psionic Overload_3
433596da-7601-44de-91b8-553837feba4a.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

2770d29e-4a11-414b-91ab-6631a1f78a36.name: Psionic Overload_4
2770d29e-4a11-414b-91ab-6631a1f78a36.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

9e040fd4-e3da-436a-9d8c-b188b528ee9b.name: Psionic Overload (Have Cancellation)
9e040fd4-e3da-436a-9d8c-b188b528ee9b.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Overload a psi's abilities, causing them to manifest uncontrollably.

5985af2a-1c29-44f1-9f74-d58c7f95a3ac.name: Psionic Overload_3
5985af2a-1c29-44f1-9f74-d58c7f95a3ac.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

32332fc5-4d89-4b67-9db3-909fcc80bb61.name: Psionic Overload_4
32332fc5-4d89-4b67-9db3-909fcc80bb61.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

3a82cb9e-1876-45e6-80fb-30cf79285638.name: Psionic Shield
3a82cb9e-1876-45e6-80fb-30cf79285638.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Bonus to Will for resisting psionic mental intrusions.

054c4720-6fb5-4bcd-bd66-196591290576.name: Psychic Armor
054c4720-6fb5-4bcd-bd66-196591290576.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Reduces damage taken from psionic attacks.

cfc935e3-2591-4e08-9168-4f41d5bc1c6c.name: Screaming
cfc935e3-2591-4e08-9168-4f41d5bc1c6c.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Mentally scream to interfere with psi usage.

f15a964d-0782-49db-b316-211bfe034096.name: True Sight (Anti-Psi)
f15a964d-0782-49db-b316-211bfe034096.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Can see through psionic illusions.

624c50b6-2c80-438f-904f-7f4793296155.name: Astral Armor
624c50b6-2c80-438f-904f-7f4793296155.notes: Astral projection ability.  DR equal to astral armor level while astral projecting.

ca4dc272-392b-430d-96ab-321ef3f55baa.name: Astral Celerity
ca4dc272-392b-430d-96ab-321ef3f55baa.notes: Astral projection ability. Increases move while astral projecting.

61d3b100-bc52-45a7-a8bb-3c0f581c0101.name: Astral Sight
61d3b100-bc52-45a7-a8bb-3c0f581c0101.notes: Astral projection ability. Can see entities on the astral plane while in the real world.

5ac8970a-5fa1-4399-9edd-7405dcb5aa19.name: Astral Sight_1
5ac8970a-5fa1-4399-9edd-7405dcb5aa19.notes: You are completely blind to the secondary plane.

5aeb504a-667a-49e5-8dea-640ee9439f83.name: Astral Sight_2
5aeb504a-667a-49e5-8dea-640ee9439f83.notes: Semi-awareness of events on the secondary plane (-4 to vision rolls).

be3c421e-3512-4ee8-a8d1-6d3957cc7736.name: Astral Sight_3
be3c421e-3512-4ee8-a8d1-6d3957cc7736.notes: Observe both planes simultaneously without penalty.

c8b3ea7a-f61f-4cda-8daa-766f82f8d299.name: Hearing
c8b3ea7a-f61f-4cda-8daa-766f82f8d299.notes: Can hear whispers from the observed plane.

a6e0eab7-47f7-485d-8ded-16e0f1d3b23e.name: Astral Sword
a6e0eab7-47f7-485d-8ded-16e0f1d3b23e.notes: Astral projection ability.  Manifest a sword of psionic energy on the astral plane. +1 damage/level.

2e1fa468-e567-406e-b16f-480b0b7f2dea.name: Astral Travel
2e1fa468-e567-406e-b16f-480b0b7f2dea.notes: Astral projection ability. You can send your mind to the outer astral plane.

5bf6e0c0-1ec8-4175-aa93-a39b765ebcc2.name: Astral Travel_1
5bf6e0c0-1ec8-4175-aa93-a39b765ebcc2.notes: 10 minutes actual time = 30 minutes on astral plane.

25d4644e-8012-4b43-bcd1-df47ea65ffa2.name: Astral Travel_2
25d4644e-8012-4b43-bcd1-df47ea65ffa2.notes: 1 minute actual time = 30 minutes on astral plane.

7c6d9edc-24b5-4d85-be04-d5c337163016.name: Astral Travel_3
7c6d9edc-24b5-4d85-be04-d5c337163016.notes: 1 minute actual time = 1 hour on astral plane.

b458e479-1b3c-4a9b-a5ce-e215f7f6ff25.name: Astral Travel_4
b458e479-1b3c-4a9b-a5ce-e215f7f6ff25.notes: 4 seconds actual time = 1 hour on astral plane.

1addf47d-60dd-43a9-af98-5980d3a75377.name: Astral Travel_5
1addf47d-60dd-43a9-af98-5980d3a75377.notes: 2 seconds actual time = 12 hours on astral plane.

b9af6430-8126-4c85-8c83-f4c74f2a868e.name: Astral Travel_6
b9af6430-8126-4c85-8c83-f4c74f2a868e.notes: 1 second actual time = infinite time on astral plane.

d40ee1d3-afdf-4272-a155-e1bbc677bc4a.name: Communication Talent
d40ee1d3-afdf-4272-a155-e1bbc677bc4a.notes: Limited Telepathy talent. Incompatible with telepathy talent.

33ad94bc-fab0-46b0-b9c5-d12e73952c01.name: Control Talent
33ad94bc-fab0-46b0-b9c5-d12e73952c01.notes: Limited Telepathy talent. Incompatible with telepathy talent.

0b453adc-0b90-4188-a5cc-ba1c20f3c97a.name: Cyberpsi Talent
0b453adc-0b90-4188-a5cc-ba1c20f3c97a.notes: Limited ergokinesis talent. Incompatible with ergokinesis talent.

63e0cb3c-20fe-4ce9-8575-cc360a545a05.name: Divination Talent
63e0cb3c-20fe-4ce9-8575-cc360a545a05.notes: Limited ESP talent. Incompatible with ESP talent.

0b721a6f-d450-42e0-95b3-9c1af2954e80.name: Electrokinesis Talent
0b721a6f-d450-42e0-95b3-9c1af2954e80.notes: Limited ergokinesis talent. Incompatible with ergokinesis talent.

c86a3ec1-b599-4975-937b-bc1a2c2f87e7.name: Offense Talent
c86a3ec1-b599-4975-937b-bc1a2c2f87e7.notes: Limited Telepathy talent. Incompatible with telepathy talent.

89485b96-e48a-4590-8d17-8e64b54db87c.name: Photokinesis Talent
89485b96-e48a-4590-8d17-8e64b54db87c.notes: Limited ergokinesis talent. Incompatible with ergokinesis talent.

e8862a06-63fc-4526-af78-32cfb1e4fb95.name: Remote Senses Talent
e8862a06-63fc-4526-af78-32cfb1e4fb95.notes: Limited ESP talent. Incompatible with ESP talent.

02b06d8c-0103-4fe4-afa1-739071eda376.name: Sense and Defense Talent
02b06d8c-0103-4fe4-afa1-739071eda376.notes: Limited Telepathy talent. Incompatible with telepathy talent.

e11dea98-8107-458e-b204-741e4cd4f326.name: Telekinesis Talent
e11dea98-8107-458e-b204-741e4cd4f326.notes: Limited psychokinesis talent. Incompatible with psychokinesis talent.

6750a807-12fc-43bc-bd94-7397d9c72e6a.name: Data Retrieval
6750a807-12fc-43bc-bd94-7397d9c72e6a.notes: Cyberpsi ability. Can retrieve files and info from computers.

8044d55b-28cc-4f70-9750-e1e36b5f535b.name: Data Retrieval_1
8044d55b-28cc-4f70-9750-e1e36b5f535b.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

c7a9888c-5ea7-49ef-8236-0a3f52e54f48.name: Data Retrieval_2
c7a9888c-5ea7-49ef-8236-0a3f52e54f48.notes: Data access at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

636f07a5-0fb7-4505-ba7c-a4bb6be913b5.name: Data Retrieval_3
636f07a5-0fb7-4505-ba7c-a4bb6be913b5.notes: Data access at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

fed6cf9b-f3d5-420f-9b03-93bd376b66f3.name: Data Retrieval_4
fed6cf9b-f3d5-420f-9b03-93bd376b66f3.notes: Data access at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241

92f9b1ad-7c78-4a5d-b967-ae137c541bbb.name: I/O Tap
92f9b1ad-7c78-4a5d-b967-ae137c541bbb.notes: Cyberpsi ability. Monitor input and output from a single system.

639902b5-8fc3-49e3-8f64-dcf7b67f973e.name: I/O Tap_1
639902b5-8fc3-49e3-8f64-dcf7b67f973e.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

4ce050e6-b3d2-4ff4-9454-fc4e9ce4fc44.name: I/O Tap_2
4ce050e6-b3d2-4ff4-9454-fc4e9ce4fc44.notes: I/O tap at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

f5e36570-f459-40bc-8954-3e78a0f98c1c.name: I/O Tap_3
f5e36570-f459-40bc-8954-3e78a0f98c1c.notes: I/O Tap at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

b1bfb30a-44ac-4240-bb72-7d020cdf5d9f.name: I/O Tap_4
b1bfb30a-44ac-4240-bb72-7d020cdf5d9f.notes: I/O Tap at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241

5660eb03-e653-43d6-a1ca-844d93fae294.name: Netrunning
5660eb03-e653-43d6-a1ca-844d93fae294.notes: Cyberpsi ability. You can project into and take over computer systems.

e09fe7b9-5a2b-48f3-bfe6-91fcd030c93d.name: Netrunning_5
e09fe7b9-5a2b-48f3-bfe6-91fcd030c93d.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in 3x longer

2610bafc-d200-46bb-9932-e4db448a50cf.name: Netrunning_6
2610bafc-d200-46bb-9932-e4db448a50cf.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in 6x longer

96e4288e-7961-4c7d-81b9-3ea1887ff5a9.name: Netrunning_7
96e4288e-7961-4c7d-81b9-3ea1887ff5a9.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in as long as desired

3278e050-f137-4e31-877c-50a6a1ecbf0a.name: Remote Control
3278e050-f137-4e31-877c-50a6a1ecbf0a.notes: Cyberpsi ability. You can issue orders to a computer.

0f518860-3c4f-46aa-b5a8-74e4548adf12.name: Remote Control_1
0f518860-3c4f-46aa-b5a8-74e4548adf12.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

fe6c969b-35b0-4c67-976c-fdf7e0986ec0.name: Remote Control_2
fe6c969b-35b0-4c67-976c-fdf7e0986ec0.notes: Data access at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

e90b40a7-e1ba-45d3-b31e-50a9c7c58813.name: Remote Control_3
e90b40a7-e1ba-45d3-b31e-50a9c7c58813.notes: Data access at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

4e451753-21e1-44fb-b1bb-c0406a5a85d0.name: Remote Control_4
4e451753-21e1-44fb-b1bb-c0406a5a85d0.notes: Data access at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241

9fba2135-c9f4-42d5-b7db-596059868d2f.name: Confuse_3
9fba2135-c9f4-42d5-b7db-596059868d2f.notes: Confuse access at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

83400f90-4165-4f82-b247-e12630a7a6ce.name: Confuse_4
83400f90-4165-4f82-b247-e12630a7a6ce.notes: Confuse at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

9fab1c14-9ea1-46bd-a945-9fd1c8d5678d.name: Dampen
9fab1c14-9ea1-46bd-a945-9fd1c8d5678d.notes: Electrokinesis ability. Stop the flow of electricity through an area.

b130114e-5685-404c-8f8d-e87ea5663dc2.name: EK Shield
b130114e-5685-404c-8f8d-e87ea5663dc2.notes: Electrokinesis ability. Divert incoming energy attacks.

4bde1cba-494a-47b1-8af1-b0b0dc9974bb.name: Electric Vision
4bde1cba-494a-47b1-8af1-b0b0dc9974bb.notes: Electrokinesis ability. You can see electric currents.

a2640ade-d730-437f-8da9-8a13b7e4df81.name: Lightning
a2640ade-d730-437f-8da9-8a13b7e4df81.notes: Electrokinesis ability. Channel power from an electrical source into a bolt of lightning.

ddb2d1f3-deac-4df1-bf5e-67b0addd80b2.name: Radar Sense
ddb2d1f3-deac-4df1-bf5e-67b0addd80b2.notes: Electrokinesis ability. You emit and analyze a radar signal.

6464b4f9-7da1-4d3b-aa21-63906b7de332.name: Surge
6464b4f9-7da1-4d3b-aa21-63906b7de332.notes: Electrokinesis ability. Short out electrical devices.

f85af055-a9d6-4bdd-9eff-4e40deba213e.name: Flash
f85af055-a9d6-4bdd-9eff-4e40deba213e.notes: A photokinesis ability.  Create a flash of light to dazzle and blind those nearby.

6ec6bc79-23c5-4e1f-94ab-7c56b941ee17.name: Hologram
6ec6bc79-23c5-4e1f-94ab-7c56b941ee17.notes: Photokinesis ability.  Create realistic images out of light; Use p. Psi22 psionic range table.

6136cec4-8f98-4f29-a001-83953da9cf98.name: Photorefraction
6136cec4-8f98-4f29-a001-83953da9cf98.notes: A photokinesis ability.  Create a flash of light to dazzle and blind those nearby.

6f0054fc-0c92-479f-8bc7-8330f993bd25.name: Aspected Visions
6f0054fc-0c92-479f-8bc7-8330f993bd25.notes: @Aspect@. Divination ability. You receive visions about a specific type of event.

2c7bb090-13b3-4c12-a090-b918b675c1a8.name: Combat Sense
2c7bb090-13b3-4c12-a090-b918b675c1a8.notes: Divination ability. You can sense incoming attacks.

fe41d5c5-6769-485f-bc51-6d581dfd9f7b.name: Prognostication
fe41d5c5-6769-485f-bc51-6d581dfd9f7b.notes: Divination ability. You can read a person's future.

d6e46dd9-f2e7-487c-8096-5ce7130f1fad.name: Retrocognition
d6e46dd9-f2e7-487c-8096-5ce7130f1fad.notes: Divination ability. You can read a object's or area's past.

b074fd8d-93f6-47a0-925c-656b429ac6ae.name: Retrocognition_2
b074fd8d-93f6-47a0-925c-656b429ac6ae.notes: Useful information regarding the object or place

3153dc99-0224-485f-8475-53e5e8d13d14.name: Retrocognitive Flashbacks
3153dc99-0224-485f-8475-53e5e8d13d14.notes: Divination ability. You receive flashes of events from the past.

56cfb4c2-60cd-4809-a92f-7795e96c628b.name: Retrocognitive Flashbacks_2
56cfb4c2-60cd-4809-a92f-7795e96c628b.notes: Useful information regarding the object or place

0a54952b-fb2f-4020-8e63-04c950b3b56b.name: Retrocognitive Flashbacks (Have Retrocognition)
0a54952b-fb2f-4020-8e63-04c950b3b56b.notes: Divination ability. You receive flashes of events from the past.

8bfcaaf4-5db7-4616-bdd1-4acc79affeba.name: Retrocognitive Flashbacks_2
8bfcaaf4-5db7-4616-bdd1-4acc79affeba.notes: Useful information regarding the object or place

75db0b64-457e-4d02-afd4-cfeac1f3501c.name: Signature Sniffer
75db0b64-457e-4d02-afd4-cfeac1f3501c.notes: Divination ability. You can detect psychic residue.

0498d8d8-7876-4871-bbdb-af2b23ed6939.name: Signature Sniffer (Have Psi Sense)
0498d8d8-7876-4871-bbdb-af2b23ed6939.notes: Divination ability. You can detect psychic residue.

9eb6709f-665a-4e73-9547-5ba89b1dbe26.name: Visions (Dream)
9eb6709f-665a-4e73-9547-5ba89b1dbe26.notes: Divination ability. You receive visions while asleep.

504ddd41-b640-4505-bcd3-ea7f614b5151.name: Visions (Full)
504ddd41-b640-4505-bcd3-ea7f614b5151.notes: Divination ability. Visions appear at appropriate times.

6fa1db24-1e2d-497e-9a3b-f577abea3cc7.name: Visions (Overwhelming)
6fa1db24-1e2d-497e-9a3b-f577abea3cc7.notes: Divination ability. Powerful visions leave you reeling.

4066b9d8-8ff1-47a4-b3a4-7b92618a06b4.name: Visions (Second Sight)
4066b9d8-8ff1-47a4-b3a4-7b92618a06b4.notes: Divination ability. You receive visions when encountering situations or people.

fccceb0b-a1f4-4ed5-8d5e-90062c18256c.name: Psi Sense
fccceb0b-a1f4-4ed5-8d5e-90062c18256c.notes: Divination ability. You can sense nearby psionic activity.

f24183a5-4c4f-4372-962d-843734d40917.name: Psi Sense_2
f24183a5-4c4f-4372-962d-843734d40917.notes: Gives direction of nearest psi use

deea90cc-93ac-40c8-b314-80b286643d7a.name: Psi Sense_3
deea90cc-93ac-40c8-b314-80b286643d7a.notes: Direction and distance to nearest psi usage

e242fc81-8ef6-4ae2-8cdf-79154a76f1ad.name: Psi Sense_4
e242fc81-8ef6-4ae2-8cdf-79154a76f1ad.notes: Direction, distance, and ability of nearest psi usage

40e05365-9746-4a38-8a8d-67be4c783c2b.name: Psidar
40e05365-9746-4a38-8a8d-67be4c783c2b.notes: Divination ability. You can sense nearby psis.

74ee838f-160e-49a8-81ea-60e696018a58.name: Psidar_3
74ee838f-160e-49a8-81ea-60e696018a58.notes: Direction and distance to nearest psi

356fde8d-ffa8-4f90-971a-61c9054ce555.name: Psidar_4
356fde8d-ffa8-4f90-971a-61c9054ce555.notes: Direction, distance, and ability known by nearest psi

ad5f6d2a-59b4-4854-a14d-3cee2020605d.name: Psychic Hunches
ad5f6d2a-59b4-4854-a14d-3cee2020605d.notes: Divination ability. You have a knack for guessing correctly.

d34875f1-a3d0-42bb-b908-a3fe1605ccf3.name: Psychic Hunches_2
d34875f1-a3d0-42bb-b908-a3fe1605ccf3.notes: On a success, GM will tell you the best option.

b9f9358e-70b1-46ca-806d-17425adb0f7f.name: Psychic Hunches_3
b9f9358e-70b1-46ca-806d-17425adb0f7f.notes: Best choice and how to approach it on a success.

42714d71-fa92-4fc2-a78f-abc3dc42baed.name: Awareness
42714d71-fa92-4fc2-a78f-abc3dc42baed.notes: Remote senses ability. You have psychic awareness of your immediate vacinity.

ba395305-ca8e-4a1b-b7fb-c66672aa404d.name: Clairaudience
ba395305-ca8e-4a1b-b7fb-c66672aa404d.notes: Remote senses ability. You can project your sense of hearing away from your body.

4d412ced-de11-4aee-8923-9a7c17f33bff.name: Clairaudience (Have Clairvoyance)
4d412ced-de11-4aee-8923-9a7c17f33bff.notes: Remote senses ability. You can project your sense of hearing away from your body.

8d63cb66-9003-481a-8802-c3bf85fb351b.name: Clairvoyance
8d63cb66-9003-481a-8802-c3bf85fb351b.notes: Remote senses ability. You can project your sense of sight away from your body.

fa8506c0-50c8-4e5f-8511-f4936e691d5f.name: Seekersense
fa8506c0-50c8-4e5f-8511-f4936e691d5f.notes: Divination ability. You can home in on anyone or anything under certain conditions.

0f0c25e3-225b-45ee-930a-52cf23004283.name: Seekersense_2
0f0c25e3-225b-45ee-930a-52cf23004283.notes: You can search for similar people or items.

bd5ea04a-7f51-41f6-8ad6-75f73a175632.name: Spirit Communication
bd5ea04a-7f51-41f6-8ad6-75f73a175632.notes: Divination ability. You can speak with spirits.

fa2ccf56-5a1c-401d-9359-e05d56449a32.name: Spirit Communication_3
fa2ccf56-5a1c-401d-9359-e05d56449a32.notes: Can see and speak with spirits.

cde3fce7-5198-48c7-904c-37c3c47f9893.name: Psychic Hunches_4
cde3fce7-5198-48c7-904c-37c3c47f9893.notes: Others can see the spirits you're speaking with.

71a55f61-3a82-4522-b7b4-bb1ad16c02ef.name: True Sight (ESP)
71a55f61-3a82-4522-b7b4-bb1ad16c02ef.notes: Divination ability. As True sight anti-psi ability p. Psi25

deaa3662-8f0b-46d8-a787-305dbb660f4d.name: Adjustment
deaa3662-8f0b-46d8-a787-305dbb660f4d.notes: Probability alteration ability.  You can affect the outcome of events.

8bb47b81-c603-4f31-a5ce-b8cdf74aa0fb.name: Coincidence
8bb47b81-c603-4f31-a5ce-b8cdf74aa0fb.notes: Probability alteration ability.  You can arrange coincidences.

5a7e15b2-7647-4ec4-9985-4d77bb207a3f.name: Combat Sense
5a7e15b2-7647-4ec4-9985-4d77bb207a3f.notes: Probability alteration ability. You can avoid attacks through luck.

3795f8f0-8be5-47fc-b6a4-ff8d7d695d9b.name: Curse
3795f8f0-8be5-47fc-b6a4-ff8d7d695d9b.notes: Probability alteration ability.  You can negatively affect someone's fate.

9d39eae0-ef8b-45ce-a32d-39271096ad95.name: Second Chance
9d39eae0-ef8b-45ce-a32d-39271096ad95.notes: Probability alteration ability.  You can reroll an action.

972ded86-0365-490d-acde-84d5631f16c8.name: Weather Control
972ded86-0365-490d-acde-84d5631f16c8.notes: Probability alteration ability.  You can alter the weather.

66539efb-e0b3-4821-bedb-2f6c69684ece.name: Aura Reading
66539efb-e0b3-4821-bedb-2f6c69684ece.notes: Psychic healing ability. You understand the basic life force of human beings.

b29f9666-117c-4639-a31a-c7092d74b2a3.name: Cure
b29f9666-117c-4639-a31a-c7092d74b2a3.notes: Psychic healing ability. You can restore the health of others.

e7e66e5d-01c4-45bd-9857-25b86ce14af9.name: Cure Disease
e7e66e5d-01c4-45bd-9857-25b86ce14af9.notes: Psychic healing ability. You cure diseases of others.

df033e33-a0df-4ad0-9ac0-7f7463d70efe.name: Cure Injury
df033e33-a0df-4ad0-9ac0-7f7463d70efe.notes: Psychic healing ability. You can heal injuries of others.

18e70347-e7fb-49db-a655-dc4b1e361653.name: Disease Shield
18e70347-e7fb-49db-a655-dc4b1e361653.notes: Psychic healing ability. You can temporarily protect someone from diseases.

9aac4ccf-2dc3-4aae-80e3-fc351a5978e3.name: Life Extension
9aac4ccf-2dc3-4aae-80e3-fc351a5978e3.notes: Psychic healing ability. You can slow the aging process within your body.

ef681ca4-473d-4dc6-ba22-20af5e0cd2e4.name: Sleep (Psychic Healing)
ef681ca4-473d-4dc6-ba22-20af5e0cd2e4.notes: Psychic healing ability. You safely put someone to sleep.

b8d1cfc9-1f74-4777-8a39-60cbd1d21167.name: Sleep_3
b8d1cfc9-1f74-4777-8a39-60cbd1d21167.notes: Can use sleep at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

57cde114-d30d-4a9c-9791-dd6a9426f14f.name: Drain DX
57cde114-d30d-4a9c-9791-dd6a9426f14f.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Reduce someone's DX.

9a3c6836-53a5-423d-930b-27de31ffe553.name: Drain Emotion
9a3c6836-53a5-423d-930b-27de31ffe553.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Reduce someone's HT.

5859ed88-09d7-4f0f-8fcc-5aaea5f774fa.name: Drain HT
5859ed88-09d7-4f0f-8fcc-5aaea5f774fa.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Reduce someone's HT.

6c70f53c-51ca-4dbc-8ed3-ad63ef1eef9c.name: Drain IQ
6c70f53c-51ca-4dbc-8ed3-ad63ef1eef9c.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Reduce someone's IQ.

5a500cd3-9ca9-43d5-b032-ced504744f21.name: Drain ST
5a500cd3-9ca9-43d5-b032-ced504744f21.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Reduce someone's ST.

d677a1c8-707a-4a92-af15-89e7527658b8.name: Steal Dreams
d677a1c8-707a-4a92-af15-89e7527658b8.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Rob someone of their dreams.

e17b5883-c225-4655-ba9d-a2615044206f.name: Steal Dreams_3
e17b5883-c225-4655-ba9d-a2615044206f.notes: Steal dreams at range; -1 penalty/yard distance.

dd52820c-060d-465c-82d5-b922486e7a3d.name: Steal Energy
dd52820c-060d-465c-82d5-b922486e7a3d.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Rob someone of their FP to replenish your own.

d9381921-2eb2-4fe2-a7d1-a66562045e05.name: Steal Life
d9381921-2eb2-4fe2-a7d1-a66562045e05.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Rob someone of their HP to replenish your own.

cccc9293-7fa9-4729-ba8b-774685194061.name: Steal Power
cccc9293-7fa9-4729-ba8b-774685194061.notes: Psychic vampirism ability. Steal someone's psi abilities.

1f507c21-fcdb-4739-bbe5-2b4d8cd28942.name: Cryokinesis
1f507c21-fcdb-4739-bbe5-2b4d8cd28942.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can lower temperatures.

c7dbcb79-ceba-4d1e-b150-32af7a500d4d.name: PK Shield
c7dbcb79-ceba-4d1e-b150-32af7a500d4d.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can resist or deflect incoming physical attacks.

ce3c5656-ed08-40d8-94a1-dfa69a956586.name: Pyrokinesis
ce3c5656-ed08-40d8-94a1-dfa69a956586.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can increase temperatures.

1e5d6465-b6f4-4f07-b755-0412ec538be5.name: Levitation
1e5d6465-b6f4-4f07-b755-0412ec538be5.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can pick yourself up and fly.

6b8b97c7-6625-423c-b9a8-490ba29d169c.name: TK Bullet
6b8b97c7-6625-423c-b9a8-490ba29d169c.notes: Telekinesis ability. Throw stones at bullet-like speeds.

955a1342-2cf4-46e2-b9cc-5f15d4875183.name: TK Crush
955a1342-2cf4-46e2-b9cc-5f15d4875183.notes: Telekinesis ability. Crush someone's internal organs by staring at them.

573eb284-956f-438b-aa5d-07f8db9ca2a5.name: TK Grab
573eb284-956f-438b-aa5d-07f8db9ca2a5.notes: Telekinesis ability. Pick up and move objects from a distance.

3ca611dc-c2f5-440c-8e0d-14b66a986ea6.name: Borrow Skill
3ca611dc-c2f5-440c-8e0d-14b66a986ea6.notes: Communication ability. Borrow a skill or language from someone.

be5a4511-4c76-42a4-8a40-65941e957ee6.name: Emotion Sense
be5a4511-4c76-42a4-8a40-65941e957ee6.notes: Communication ability. You get a brief flash of the emotions from the subject.

b3aa9d4a-2aa2-4c09-ba38-6ff68c91e0ba.name: Telereceive
b3aa9d4a-2aa2-4c09-ba38-6ff68c91e0ba.notes: Communication ability. You can read another person's thoughts.

bd85e103-de3c-44f9-b292-25075a20a353.name: Telereceive (Shallow)
bd85e103-de3c-44f9-b292-25075a20a353.notes: Communication ability. You can read another person's surface thoughts.

4bee8f6c-c4f9-41a3-83da-78b9444c0d1b.name: Telesend
4bee8f6c-c4f9-41a3-83da-78b9444c0d1b.notes: Communication ability. You can read project your thoughts into another's mind.

64503e69-81e8-47f8-899a-0f6b2fb08458.name: Telespeak
64503e69-81e8-47f8-899a-0f6b2fb08458.notes: Communication ability. You can converse with someone telepathically.

77a7bb77-ff58-43ed-a823-4c3a9199ca8f.name: Aspect
77a7bb77-ff58-43ed-a823-4c3a9199ca8f.notes: Control ability.  You can alter how people feel about you.

4f0892dc-260e-43b7-8220-4aed9358122a.name: Emotion Control
4f0892dc-260e-43b7-8220-4aed9358122a.notes: Control ability.  You can sway the emotions of others.

1f116206-c8b1-4a60-909f-c4fbea9ff8af.name: Emotion Control_3
1f116206-c8b1-4a60-909f-c4fbea9ff8af.notes: Emotion control at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

74e5694d-5d26-49d8-9e3e-84befa3247be.name: Emotion Control (Have Suggestion)
74e5694d-5d26-49d8-9e3e-84befa3247be.notes: Control ability.  You can sway the emotions of others.

ab642a28-3273-4d6c-b06b-3a59cfa69345.name: Emotion Control_3
ab642a28-3273-4d6c-b06b-3a59cfa69345.notes: Emotion control at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

6d550ce0-1ad8-46f9-a8d6-247f2bc1409a.name: Mind Swap
6d550ce0-1ad8-46f9-a8d6-247f2bc1409a.notes: Control ability.  You can trade bodies with someone.

bc5ab9c5-1d2e-4caa-8120-f6a23ad7e730.name: Mindwipe
bc5ab9c5-1d2e-4caa-8120-f6a23ad7e730.notes: Control ability.  You can wipe the last few minutes from someone's mind.

4f58171d-3020-4576-809c-874284a01721.name: Sensory Control
4f58171d-3020-4576-809c-874284a01721.notes: Control ability.  You can control what your target sees, hears, etc.

71a2f3c3-3168-4481-ae53-ed4849d633b1.name: Sensory Control_2
71a2f3c3-3168-4481-ae53-ed4849d633b1.notes: Sensory control at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

a246b707-64bc-4611-8efc-113f051db6c4.name: Sensory Control_2
a246b707-64bc-4611-8efc-113f051db6c4.notes: Sensory control at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

73833c00-c52f-4b1c-9310-c9a9f137b5c4.name: Suggestion
73833c00-c52f-4b1c-9310-c9a9f137b5c4.notes: Control ability.  You can send telepathic commands to a subject.

efaa91cd-3d3f-4b08-b91d-f057d7d9244e.name: Telecontrol
efaa91cd-3d3f-4b08-b91d-f057d7d9244e.notes: Control ability.  You can completely take over the body of a human being.

42cacd0a-a474-4c53-b4e8-92ba08274a3b.name: Instill Fear
42cacd0a-a474-4c53-b4e8-92ba08274a3b.notes: Offense ability. Project fear and terror into someone's heart.

6bf9de8f-81ba-4bf7-b1d2-15832beb8cda.name: Mental Blow
6bf9de8f-81ba-4bf7-b1d2-15832beb8cda.notes: Offense ability. Overload someone's brain with a psychic attack.

a9867543-a145-4488-a481-3ede23fadddd.name: Mental Blow_3
a9867543-a145-4488-a481-3ede23fadddd.notes: Mental Blow at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

b523b203-8796-4ac1-a4a5-700c28468e9a.name: Mental Stab
b523b203-8796-4ac1-a4a5-700c28468e9a.notes: Offense ability. Psychically attack someone's brain, doing real damage.

615a0c32-62ba-49df-b6f3-3f61c840603d.name: Mental Stab_3
615a0c32-62ba-49df-b6f3-3f61c840603d.notes: Mental Blow at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

7fc38d7d-beab-424c-8fd3-8137e3a17e6a.name: Sleep (Telepathy)
7fc38d7d-beab-424c-8fd3-8137e3a17e6a.notes: Offense ability. You safely put someone to sleep.

b22902f7-1003-4a06-9951-0f9d58003a95.name: Sleep_3
b22902f7-1003-4a06-9951-0f9d58003a95.notes: Can use sleep at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

2169148b-6479-4f4a-a7e8-0ebfe318edc1.name: Mind Clouding
2169148b-6479-4f4a-a7e8-0ebfe318edc1.notes: Sense and defense ability. People don't perceive your presence.

eade190d-7a6b-4258-837b-85c86b61c85f.name: Mind Shield
eade190d-7a6b-4258-837b-85c86b61c85f.notes: Sense and defense ability.You have a mental shield protecting you.

8eaf5dcc-440c-4243-950f-a4dd23d57516.name: Telepathy Sense
8eaf5dcc-440c-4243-950f-a4dd23d57516.notes: Sense and defense ability. You can sense nearby telepathic activity.

8e4fbacf-3cb8-43e7-85c5-cf3d2ed3b1c0.name: Telepathy Sense_2
8e4fbacf-3cb8-43e7-85c5-cf3d2ed3b1c0.notes: Gives direction of nearest telepathy use

b3aa140c-8661-444f-b5a2-73bf11645201.name: Telepathy Sense_3
b3aa140c-8661-444f-b5a2-73bf11645201.notes: Direction and distance to nearest telepathy usage

66e6b5d7-5590-43dd-a91f-e9a9f8464bdf.name: Telepathy Sense_4
66e6b5d7-5590-43dd-a91f-e9a9f8464bdf.notes: Direction, distance, and ability of nearest telepathy usage

9ff91a4a-937b-4cad-a508-c8872b845463.name: Telescan
9ff91a4a-937b-4cad-a508-c8872b845463.notes: Sense and defense ability. You can search for minds you know.

16053349-93af-4975-bbaf-b34c007b254d.name: Autoteleport
16053349-93af-4975-bbaf-b34c007b254d.notes: Teleportation ability. Instantly travel over great distances.

7e795e05-b8e1-4cd2-a5ac-f7820e380fa4.name: Combat Teleport
7e795e05-b8e1-4cd2-a5ac-f7820e380fa4.notes: Teleportation ability. Teleport to dodge attacks.

03daaf45-96e2-40f3-bd3c-9bd52c93cd82.name: Touch only
03daaf45-96e2-40f3-bd3c-9bd52c93cd82.notes: You must have skin-to-skin contact to exoteleport the subject.

b73a3a56-f71a-475d-840a-454899f6bf76.name: Combat Teleport (Have Autoteleport)
b73a3a56-f71a-475d-840a-454899f6bf76.notes: Teleportation ability. Teleport to dodge attacks.

c9134965-e336-4a24-a002-766d65dd9b03.name: Exoteleport
c9134965-e336-4a24-a002-766d65dd9b03.notes: Teleportation ability. Teleport other people or objects.

fa28134c-dfe3-465b-abb7-cc6905fe7dcd.name: Touch only
fa28134c-dfe3-465b-abb7-cc6905fe7dcd.notes: You must have skin-to-skin contact to exoteleport the subject.

b3ff3a60-6fff-46b1-8942-7e51d26c919c.name: Innerportation
b3ff3a60-6fff-46b1-8942-7e51d26c919c.notes: Teleportation ability. Damage someone by teleporting away portions of their body.

e0fbc0be-b2c9-4aad-bb9e-88d4f498a1ef.name: Portersense
e0fbc0be-b2c9-4aad-bb9e-88d4f498a1ef.notes: Teleportation ability. You can detect teleportation.

4e536560-e95b-4b1a-a5fb-6373f9749d05.name: Portersense_2
4e536560-e95b-4b1a-a5fb-6373f9749d05.notes: You know the direction to the teleportation activity.

7bad8123-acd5-49d0-af5f-834a18f17175.name: Portersense_3
7bad8123-acd5-49d0-af5f-834a18f17175.notes: You know the direction and distance to the teleportation activity.

423036e3-ed5a-42dd-953f-b2fcef904d88.name: Portersense_4
423036e3-ed5a-42dd-953f-b2fcef904d88.notes: Passively know the direction and distance to the teleportation activity.

20b093d6-84b4-44cd-8c78-8ab24b48e3f6.name: RL Exoteleport
20b093d6-84b4-44cd-8c78-8ab24b48e3f6.notes: Teleportation ability.Teleport other people or objects.

d104b475-c1a8-41a7-a8e4-83b1bf13c55d.name: Touch only
d104b475-c1a8-41a7-a8e4-83b1bf13c55d.notes: You must have skin-to-skin contact to RL exoteleport the subject.
